summary.span: 实现文件传输协议 (FTP) 客户端。

span.span: Implements a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取的实例，使用方法。To obtain an instance of , use the method. 你还可以使用类上载和下载信息从 FTP 服务器。You can also use the class to upload and download information from an FTP server. 使用这些方法之一，当你指定的网络资源使用 FTP 方案 (例如， `"ftp://contoso.com"`)类提供了以编程方式与 FTP 服务器进行交互的能力。Using either of these approaches, when you specify a network resource that uses the FTP scheme (for example, `"ftp://contoso.com"`) the class provides the ability to programmatically interact with FTP servers. 该 URI 可以是相对或绝对。The URI may be relative or absolute. 如果窗体的 URI 是`"ftp://contoso.com/%2fpath"`(%2f 是转义字符 '/')，则该 URI 是绝对的当前目录是`/path`。If the URI is of the form `"ftp://contoso.com/%2fpath"` (%2f is an escaped '/'), then the URI is absolute, and the current directory is `/path`. 如果，但是，URI 的形式`"ftp://contoso.com/path"`，.NET Framework 第一次登录到 FTP 服务器 (通过使用用户名和密码设置属性)，则当前目录设置为`/path`。If, however, the URI is of the form `"ftp://contoso.com/path"`, first the .NET Framework logs into the FTP server (using the user name and password set by the property), then the current directory is set to `/path`. 你必须具有有效的用户名和密码为服务器或服务器必须允许匿名登录。You must have a valid user name and password for the server or the server must allow anonymous logon. 你可以指定用于通过设置连接到服务器的凭据属性也可以将它们包含在URI 部分传递给方法。You can specify the credentials used to connect to the server by setting the property or you can include them in the portion of the URI passed to the method. 如果包含在 URI 中，信息属性设置为具有指定的用户名和密码信息的新网络凭据。If you include information in the URI, the property is set to a new network credential with the specified user name and password information. > [!CAUTION] > 除非属性是`true`，所有数据和命令，其中包括你的用户名和密码信息，都发送到服务器以明文形式。Unless the property is `true`, all data and commands, including your user name and password information, are sent to the server in clear text. 监视网络流量的任何人都可以查看你的凭据和使用它们来连接到服务器。Anyone monitoring network traffic can view your credentials and use them to connect to the server. 如果你要连接到 FTP 服务器需要凭据，并支持安全套接字层 (SSL)，则应设置到`true`。If you are connecting to an FTP server that requires credentials and supports Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), you should set to `true`. 你必须具有访问 FTP 资源; 否则为引发异常。You must have to access the FTP resource; otherwise, a exception is thrown. 指定要通过设置发送到服务器的 FTP 命令属性中定义的值结构。Specify the FTP command to send to the server by setting the property to a value defined in the structure. 若要将传输文本数据，请更改属性从其默认值 (`true`) 到`false`。To transmit text data, change the property from its default value (`true`) to `false`. 有关详细信息和限制，请参阅。For details and restrictions, see . 使用时对象将文件上载到服务器，必须将文件内容写入请求流通过调用获取方法或其异步对应和方法。When using an object to upload a file to a server, you must write the file content to the request stream obtained by calling the method or its asynchronous counterparts, the and methods. 必须写入流，并在发送请求之前关闭的流。You must write to the stream and close the stream before sending the request. 请求发送到服务器通过调用方法或其异步对应和方法。Requests are sent to the server by calling the method or its asynchronous counterparts, the and methods. 完成请求的操作后，返回对象。When the requested operation completes, an object is returned. 对象提供的操作以及从服务器下载的任何数据的状态。The object provides the status of the operation and any data downloaded from the server. 你可以设置超时值以读取或写入到服务器通过使用属性。You can set a time-out value for reading or writing to the server by using the property. 如果超出超时期限，则调用的方法将引发与设置为。If the time-out period is exceeded, the calling method throws a with set to . 当从 FTP 服务器，下载文件，如果该命令成功，才会在响应对象的流中可用请求的文件的内容。When downloading a file from an FTP server, if the command was successful, the contents of the requested file are available in the response object's stream. 你可以通过调用访问此流方法。You can access this stream by calling the method. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 如果属性设置，或者直接或者在配置文件中，与 FTP 服务器的通信都通过指定的代理。If the property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the specified proxy. 如果指定的代理，则 HTTP 代理，仅， ，和受支持命令的。If the specified proxy is an HTTP proxy, only the , , and commands are supported. 仅下载二进制内容缓存;也就是说，接收使用的内容命令属性设置为`true`。Only downloaded binary content is cached; that is, content received using the command with the property set to `true`. 多个s 尽可能重用现有连接。Multiple s reuse existing connections, if possible. 有关 FTP 协议的详细信息，请参阅[RFC 959： 文件传输协议](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt)。For more information about the FTP protocol, see [RFC 959: File Transfer Protocol](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 FTP 服务器中删除文件。The following code example demonstrates deleting a file from an FTP server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#4)] 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用从 FTP 服务器下载文件类。The following code example demonstrates downloading a file from an FTP server by using the class. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#5)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用异步操作以将文件上载到 FTP 服务器。The following code example demonstrates using asynchronous operations to upload a file to an FTP server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#1)]

permission.span: 用于访问引用此请求的资源。

span.span: for accessing the resource referenced by this request.
Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 终止异步 FTP 操作。

span.span: Terminates an asynchronous FTP operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有正在进行操作，则此方法没有任何影响。If there is no operation in progress, this method does nothing. 如果正在进行的文件传输，则此方法将终止传输。If a file transfer is in progress, this method terminates the transfer. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用户可以如何终止异步上载到服务器的文件从本地目录。The following code example demonstrates how the user can terminate an asynchronous upload of a file from the local directory to the server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override IAsyncResult BeginGetRequestStream (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetRequestStream(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BeginGetRequestStream (callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: override IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetRequestStream(AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: callback
param.span: 一个 委托，它引用操作完成时要调用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含操作的相关信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 callback 委托。

span.span: This object is passed to the callback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 开始以异步方式打开请求的内容流以便写入。

span.span: Begins asynchronously opening a request's content stream for writing.
An instance that indicates the status of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须通过调用完成异步操作方法。You must complete the asynchronous operation by calling the method. 通常情况下，由所引用的方法调用`callback`。Typically, is called by the method referenced by `callback`. 要确定该操作的状态，请检查属性此方法返回的对象。To determine the state of the operation, check the properties in the object returned by this method. 此方法不会阻止等待流时。This method does not block while waiting for the stream. 若要阻止，请调用来代替此方法。To block, call in place of this method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何开始一个异步操作以获取请求的流。The following code example demonstrates beginning an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#4)]

summary.span: 开始以异步方式向 FTP 服务器发送请求并从 FTP 服务器接收响应。

span.span: Begins sending a request and receiving a response from an FTP server asynchronously.
An instance that indicates the status of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须通过调用完成异步操作方法。You must complete the asynchronous operation by calling the method. 通常情况下，由所引用的方法调用`callback`。Typically, is called by the method referenced by `callback`. 要确定该操作的状态，请检查属性返回对象方法。To determine the state of the operation, check the properties in the object returned by the method. 如果属性设置，或者直接或者在配置文件中，与 FTP 服务器的通信都通过指定的代理。If the property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the specified proxy. 不会阻止等待来自服务器的响应时。 does not block while waiting for the response from the server. 若要阻止，请调用方法代替。To block, call the method in place of . 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For more information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果是引发，使用和异常来确定来自服务器的响应的属性。If a is thrown, use the and properties of the exception to determine the response from the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示结束异步操作以获取请求的流，然后启动一个请求以获取响应。The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream, and then starting a request to get the response. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#5)]

summary.span: 获取用于建立到 FTP 服务器的加密连接的证书。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificates used for establishing an encrypted connection to the FTP server.

value.span: 包含客户端证书的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the client certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端证书用于初始的 SSL 连接协商期间验证客户端。Client certificates are used to authenticate the client during the initial SSL connection negotiation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > .NET Framework 缓存 SSL 会话，因为它们创建，并尝试尽可能重用为新请求，缓存的会话。The .NET Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible. 尝试重新使用的 SSL 会话，.NET Framework 会使用的第一个元素（如果没有一个），或尝试重用匿名会话，如果为空。When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the .NET Framework uses the first element of (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous session if is empty.

exception.span: 为集运算指定的值为 。

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionGroupName { get; set; }
.property instance string ConnectionGroupName
Public Overrides Property ConnectionGroupName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ConnectionGroupName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置连接组的名称，该连接组包含用于发送当前请求的服务点。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the connection group that contains the service point used to send the current request.

value.span: 包含连接组名称的 值。

span.span: A value that contains a connection group name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接组将一组请求与一个特定连接或一组的连接相关联。Connection groups associate a set of requests with a particular connection or set of connections. 仅当在请求的凭据相同，然后请求指定的连接组名称在相同的应用程序域中，发出的请求才可以重用连接组中的连接。The connections in a connection group can be reused only by requests originating in the same application domain, when the credentials on the request are the same and the request specifies the connection group name. 当请求未指定连接组名称时，可以使用请求的服务器不是与连接组关联的任何现有的连接。When a request does not specify a connection group name, any existing connection to the requested server that is not associated with a connection group can be used. 当凭据都不相同时，现有的连接已关闭，并且新的请求必须重新进行身份验证。When the credentials are not the same, the existing connection is closed and the new request must be reauthenticated. 使用连接组可以提高性能，因为这将允许所有用户重用使用用户的凭据进行身份验证的连接请求。Using connection groups can improve performance because this allows all of the requests for a user to reuse the connection authenticated with the user's credentials. 更改属性在调用， ， ，或方法使异常。Changing the property after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索此属性的值。The following code example retrieves the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#16)]

exception.span: 对于一个已在进行的请求为此属性指定了一个新值。

span.span: A new value was specified for this property for a request that is already in progress.

summary.span: 获取或设置请求所下载的文件的字节偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets a byte offset into the file being downloaded by this request.

value.span: 指定文件偏移量（以字节为单位）的 实例。

span.span: An instance that specifies the file offset, in bytes.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性从 FTP 服务器下载文件时。Set the property when downloading a file from an FTP server. 此偏移量指示标记要下载的数据的开始位置的服务器的文件中的位置。This offset indicates the position in the server's file that marks the start of the data to be downloaded. 偏移量指定为从该文件; 开始的字节数第一个字节的偏移量为零。The offset is specified as the number of bytes from the start of the file; the offset of the first byte is zero. 设置导致发送重新启动 (`REST`) 命令到服务器。Setting causes the to send a restart (`REST`) command to the server. 如果你将数据上载到服务器，大多数 FTP 服务器实现会忽略此命令。This command is ignored by most FTP server implementations if you are uploading data to the server. 更改之后调用， ， ，或方法使异常。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示从服务器和附加到本地文件的下载的数据文件的下载的一部分。The following code example demonstrates downloading part of a file from a server and appending the downloaded data to a local file. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于与 FTP 服务器通信的凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the credentials used to communicate with the FTP server.

value.span: 实例；如果还未设置该属性，则为 。

span.span: An instance; otherwise, if the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要使用匿名登录进行连接时指定凭据。You are not required to specify credentials when connecting using anonymous logon. 必须设置属性使用类型的凭据; 这可确保，可以读取并发送到服务器的用户名和密码。You must set the property by using a credential of type ; this ensures that the user name and password can be read and sent to the server. > [!CAUTION] > 除非传输到服务器时未加密凭据信息属性设置为`true`。Credentials information is not encrypted when transmitted to the server unless the property is set to `true`. 更改之后调用， ， ，或方法使异常。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索此属性的值，并使用它来显示用户名。The following code example retrieves the value of this property and uses it to display the user name. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy DefaultCachePolicy { get; set; }
.property class System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy DefaultCachePolicy
Public Shared Property DefaultCachePolicy As RequestCachePolicy
public: static property System::Net::Cache::RequestCachePolicy ^ DefaultCachePolicy { System::Net::Cache::RequestCachePolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Net::Cache::RequestCachePolicy ^ value); };

summary.span: 定义所有 FTP 请求的默认缓存策略。

span.span: Defines the default cache policy for all FTP requests.

value.span: ，定义 FTP 请求的缓存策略。

span.span: A that defines the cache policy for FTP requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅接收使用的内容缓存命令。Only content received using the command is cached. 下表描述了 FTP 上的缓存策略的效果。The following table describes the effects of FTP caching policies on . |策略Policy|效果Effect| |------------|------------| ||如果资源是最新，内容的长度是准确的并且存在过期、 修改和内容长度属性将，返回缓存的资源。Returns the cached resource if the resource is fresh, the content length is accurate, and the expiration, modification, and content length attributes are present.| ||从服务器返回的资源。Returns the resource from the server.| ||返回缓存的资源，如果内容长度存在并且匹配的项大小;否则，将引发。Returns the cached resource if the content length is present and matches the entry size; otherwise, throws a .| ||如果提供了内容的长度，并且匹配的项大小;，返回缓存的资源否则为该资源从服务器下载，并返回到调用方。Returns the cached resource if the content length is provided and matches the entry size; otherwise, the resource is downloaded from the server and is returned to the caller.| ||如果缓存的资源的时间戳是相同的服务器; 上的资源的时间戳，则返回缓存的资源否则为资源是从服务器下载、 存储在缓存中，并返回至调用方。Returns the cached resource if the timestamp of the cached resource is the same as the time stamp of the resource on the server; otherwise, the resource is downloaded from the server, stored in the cache, and returned to the caller.| ||从服务器下载的资源、 将其存储在缓存中，和将资源返回给调用方。Downloads the resource from the server, stores it in the cache, and returns the resource to the caller.| ||如果缓存的资源存在，则删除它。If a cached resource exists, it is deleted. 资源从服务器下载，并返回到调用方。The resource is downloaded from the server and is returned to the caller.| > [!NOTE] > 设置将替代任何配置设置。Setting overrides any configuration setting.

exception.span: 调用方尝试将此属性设置为 。

span.span: The caller tried to set this property to .

summary.span: 获取或设置 ，它指定是否使用 SSL 连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a that specifies that an SSL connection should be used.

value.span: 如果控制和数据传输是加密的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if control and data transmissions are encrypted; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 除非属性是`true`，所有数据和命令，其中包括你的用户名和密码信息，都发送到服务器以明文形式。Unless the property is `true`, all data and commands, including your user name and password information, are sent to the server in clear text. 监视网络流量的任何人都可以查看你的凭据和使用它们来连接到服务器。Anyone monitoring network traffic can view your credentials and use them to connect to the server. 如果你要连接到 FTP 服务器需要凭据，并支持 SSL，则应设置到`true`。If you are connecting to an FTP server that requires credentials and supports SSL, you should set to `true`. `"AUTH TLS"`命令发送到服务器以请求加密的会话。The `"AUTH TLS"` command is sent to the server to request an encrypted session. 如果服务器无法识别此命令，你将收到异常。If the server does not recognize this command, you receive a exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用加密的连接以下载从 FTP 服务器列出的目录。The following code example uses an encrypted connection to download the directory listing from an FTP server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该操作未完成，方法阻止，直至该操作完成。If the operation has not completed, the method blocks until the operation completes. 若要确定操作是否已完成，请检查属性之前调用。To determine whether the operation has completed, check the property before calling . 除了在"异常，"中记下的异常打开用于写入的流时引发的异常。In addition to the exceptions noted in "Exceptions," rethrows exceptions that were thrown while opening the stream for writing. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何结束异步操作以获取请求的流。The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a request's stream. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该操作未完成时调用方法时，阻止，直至该操作完成。If the operation has not completed at the time the method is called, blocks until the operation completes. 若要防止阻塞，请检查属性之前调用。To prevent blocking, check the property before calling . 除了在"异常，"中记下的异常与服务器通信时引发的异常。In addition to the exceptions noted in "Exceptions," rethrows exceptions that were thrown while communicating with the server. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何结束异步操作以获取响应。The following code example demonstrates ending an asynchronous operation to get a response. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CPP/async.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpAsync/CS/async.cs#6)]

summary.span: 检索用于向 FTP 服务器上载数据的流。

span.span: Retrieves the stream used to upload data to an FTP server.

returns.span: 可写 实例，用于存储要由当前请求发送到服务器的数据。

span.span: A writable instance used to store data to be sent to the server by the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置之前调用的请求属性方法。Set the request properties before calling the method. 将数据写入流之后, 你必须关闭在发送请求之前的流。After writing the data to the stream, you must close the stream prior to sending the request. 如果你尚未设置属性或，无法获取流。If you have not set the property to or , you cannot get the stream. 在等待流时阻止。 blocks while waiting for the stream. 若要防止此情况，调用方法代替。To prevent this, call the method in place of . > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将文件复制到请求的数据流并将请求发送到服务器，以便将数据上载并将其追加到文件。The following code example demonstrates copying a file to a request's data stream and sending a request to the server to upload the data and append it to a file. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#3)]

summary.span: 返回 FTP 服务器响应。

span.span: Returns the FTP server response.

returns.span: 包含一个 实例的 引用。

span.span: A reference that contains an instance.

returns.span: 此对象包含 FTP 服务器对请求的响应。

span.span: This object contains the FTP server's response to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要访问的特定于 FTP 的属性，必须强制转换到此方法返回的对象。To access the FTP-specific properties, you must cast the object returned by this method to . 控制连接建立，并还可以创建数据连接。 causes a control connection to be established, and might also create a data connection. 受到阻止，直到收到响应。 blocks until the response is received. 若要防止此情况，你可以通过执行此操作以异步方式调用和方法代替。To prevent this, you can perform this operation asynchronously by calling the and methods in place of . 如果属性设置，或者直接或者在配置文件中，与 FTP 服务器的通信都通过代理。If the property is set, either directly or in a configuration file, communications with the FTP server are made through the proxy. 如果是引发，使用和异常来确定来自服务器的响应的属性。If a is thrown, use the and properties of the exception to determine the response from the server. 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 多次调用返回相同的响应对象; 请求不重新颁发。Multiple calls to return the same response object; the request is not reissued. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将文件复制到请求的数据的流和发送请求以将数据追加到文件服务器。The following code example demonstrates copying a file to a request's data stream and sending a request to append data to a file to the server. 该示例通过调用发送请求和阻止，直到由服务器返回的响应。The example calls to send the request and block until the response is returned by the server. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#3)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要发送到 FTP 服务器的命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the command to send to the FTP server.

span.span: A value that contains the FTP command to send to the server.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定哪个命令发送到服务器。The property determines which command is sent to the server. 你设置通过定义中的公共字段成员的字符串类。You set the by using the strings defined in the public field members of the class. 请注意，在中定义字符串类是唯一支持的选项属性。Note that the strings defined in the class are the only supported options for the property. 设置为任何其他值的属性将导致异常。Setting the property to any other value will result in an exception. 设置时到，你必须这样做，然后再调方法。When setting to , you must do so before calling the method. 调用这些成员中的正确的顺序原因失败异常在尝试获取请求流时。Failure to call these members in the correct order causes a exception when you attempt to get the request stream. 有关提供凭据对象必须有权执行的指定的方法。The credentials supplied for the object must have permission to perform the specified method. 如果没有，则 FTP 命令将失败。If not, the FTP command fails. 若要确定是成功还是失败的命令，检查和属性。To determine the success or failure of a command, check the and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将此属性设置为。The following code example sets this property to . summary.span: 获取或设置用于与 FTP 服务器通信的代理。

span.span: Gets or sets the proxy used to communicate with the FTP server.

value.span: 负责与 FTP 服务器通信的 实例。

span.span: An instance responsible for communicating with the FTP server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识与 FTP 服务器进行通信的实例。The property identifies the instance that communicates with the FTP server. 将代理设置由系统使用的配置文件和 Internet 资源管理器中本地网络设置。The proxy is set by the system by using configuration files and the Internet Explorer Local Area Network settings. 若要指定应使用无代理，设置到返回的代理实例方法。To specify that no proxy should be used, set to the proxy instance returned by the method. 有关自动代理检测的详细信息，请参阅[自动代理检测](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md)。For more information about automatic proxy detection, see [Automatic Proxy Detection](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md). 必须设置之前数据写入请求的流或获取响应。You must set before writing data to the request's stream or getting the response. 更改之后调用， ， ，或方法使异常。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. 类支持 HTTP 和 ISA 防火墙客户端代理。The class supports HTTP and ISA Firewall Client proxies. 如果指定的代理，则 HTTP 代理，仅， ，和受支持命令的。If the specified proxy is an HTTP proxy, only the , , and commands are supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays this property value. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#16)]

summary.span: 获取或设置写入或读取流时的超时。

span.span: Gets or sets a time-out when reading from or writing to a stream.

value.span: 读取或写入超时之前的毫秒数。默认值为 300,000 毫秒（5 分钟）。

span.span: The number of milliseconds before the reading or writing times out. The default value is 300,000 milliseconds (5 minutes).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 写入到返回的流时使用方法或从返回的流读取方法。The is used when writing to the stream returned by the method or reading from the stream returned by the method. 具体而言，属性控制的超时时间方法，用于读取返回的流方法，以及方法，用于向返回的流写入方法。Specifically, the property controls the time-out for the method, which is used to read the stream returned by the method, and for the method, which is used to write to the stream returned by the method. 如果超出超时期限，则调用的方法将引发与设置为。If the time-out period is exceeded, the calling method throws a with set to . 若要指定要等待的时间完成请求的时间量，请使用属性。To specify the amount of time to wait for the request to complete, use the property.

exception.span: 已发送请求。

span.span: The request has already been sent.

exception.span: 为 Set 操作指定的值小于或等于零，并且不等于 。

span.span: The value specified for a set operation is less than or equal to zero and is not equal to .

summary.span: 获取用于连接 FTP 服务器的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object used to connect to the FTP server.

value.span: 可用于自定义连接行为的 对象。

span.span: A object that can be used to customize connection behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有对象存在，则创建一个用于 FTP 服务器。If no object exists, one is created for the FTP server. 若要设置的最大可以打开并处于待 FTP 服务器的连接数，设置属性此属性返回的实例。To set the maximum number of connections that can be open for an FTP server, set the property of the instance returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例请求中检索的服务点，并将最大连接数设置为一个。The following code example retrieves the service point from a request and sets the maximum number of connections to one. summary.span: 获取或设置等待请求的毫秒数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds to wait for a request.

value.span: 一个 值，包含请求超时前等待的毫秒数。默认值为 。

span.span: An value that contains the number of milliseconds to wait before a request times out. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定一个无限的值，设置属性(-1)。To specify an infinite value, set the property to (-1). 这是默认值。This is the default value. 是与发出同步请求的毫秒数方法等待响应以及方法等待流。 is the number of milliseconds that a synchronous request made with the method waits for a response and that the method waits for a stream. 如果资源未响应的超时时间内，请求将引发与属性设置为。If a resource does not respond within the time-out period, the request throws a with the property set to . 更改之后调用， ， ，或方法使异常。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. 域名系统 (DNS) 查询可能需要最多为 15 秒为单位返回或超时。如果你的请求包含需要解析的主机名，并设置为值小于 15 秒，可能需要 15 秒或更之前引发来指示你的请求超时。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性。The following code example sets this property. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#23)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指定文件传输的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the data type for file transfers.

value.span: ，指示服务器要传输的是二进制数据；，指示数据为文本。

span.span: to indicate to the server that the data to be transferred is binary; to indicate that the data is text.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要发送二进制数据，例如一个映像，将此属性设置为`true`。If you are sending binary data, such as an image, set this property to `true`. 如果要发送文本，将属性设置为`false`。If you are sending text, set the property to `false`. 指定`true`导致发送`"TYPE I"`命令到服务器。Specifying `true` causes the to send a `"TYPE I"` command to the server. 指定`false`导致发送`"Type A"`命令到服务器。Specifying `false` causes the to send a `"Type A"` command to the server. FTP 服务器可以忽略这些命令。FTP servers can ignore these commands. 更改之后调用， ， ，或方法使异常。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索并显示为指定的属性值对象。The following code example retrieves and displays property values for a specified object. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#15)]

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端应用程序的数据传输过程的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the behavior of a client application's data transfer process.

value.span: 如果客户端应用程序的数据传输过程侦听数据端口上的连接，则为 ；如果客户端应在数据端口上启动连接，则为 。

span.span: if the client application's data transfer process listens for a connection on the data port; otherwise, if the client should initiate a connection on the data port.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性`true`发送"`PASV"`命令到服务器。Setting the property to `true` sends the "`PASV"` command to the server. 此命令请求数据端口上侦听并将等待连接，而不是启动一个收到传输命令的服务器。This command requests the server to listen on a data port and to wait for a connection rather than initiate one upon receipt of a transfer command. 有关使用指定的行为的说明，请参阅[RFC 959:"文件传输协议"，第 3.2 节:"建立数据连接"和部分 4.1.2： 传输参数的命令"](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt)。For a description of the behaviors that are specified using , see [RFC 959: "File Transfer Protocol", Section 3.2: "Establishing Data Connections" and Section 4.1.2: "Transfer Parameter Commands"](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc959.txt). 更改之后调用， ， ，或方法使异常。Changing after calling the , , , or method causes an exception. 如果设置为`true`、 FTP 服务器可能不会发送该文件的大小和下载进度可能始终为零。If is set to `true`, the FTP server may not send the size of the file, and download progress can always be zero. 如果设置为`false`，防火墙可以引发警报，并阻止文件下载。If is set to `false`, a firewall can raise an alert and block the file download. ## Examples 下面的代码示例检索并显示为指定的属性值对象。The following code example retrieves and displays property values for a specified object. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#6)]
